That got a LOOK from WHEELIE, him mu=
ttering the Cybertronian aphorism 'No Slag Nightbeat' under his vocalizer t=
o the last comment over from Backstop, equivalent and translatable to the o=
ld Terran descriptor for a fabled detective stating the blindingly obvious.=



WHEELIE nodded up sadly at GRIMLOCK, "Fighting wtihin his own mind, he c=
annot find someone to protect his behind.  Out of it how to get him I do no=
t know, but remain this way he cannot go."

Pausing up and running through =
his processor any conceivable way they could do.  They could not leave GRIM=
LOCK out here and abandon him to the jungle and recapture by whomever contr=
olled him.  They could not take him with them in search and risk him attack=
ing them each time his resistance was disrupted.  They couldn't do a proces=
sor jack-up out here in the field either to try and upload themselves to GR=
IMLOCK's central processor.  Appealing to GRIMLOCk's pride only seemed to w=
ork as a part time blockage..

Finally, WHEELIE glanced at the others, "All=
 of you, go after who did this to him.  Here I will stay, with him.  I will=
 try to keep him occupied, the rest of you free him for his pride.  Away fr=
om the scene, we shall go, wtih luck you shall be able to free him, how I d=
o not know."
